auth.loginHint: Enter your username and password. Default bootstrap credentials can be configured on the server (INIT_USERNAME/INIT_PASSWORD).
auth.sessionSecretHint: Tip: Set SESSION_SECRET in production. Otherwise, restarting the server will invalidate sessions.
auth.onlyChangeUsername: Leave empty to change username only
auth.resetTip: Tip: Please change the default password right after the first login.

compare.title: Compare Upgrade
compare.subtitle: Configure source/target and click Compare to generate selectable steps. Dry-run is recommended before Apply.
compare.planNote: Note: table/column add/update/delete will be converted to NocoDB Meta API calls on the target. For delete operations, export JSONL and review manually.
compare.serverNotResponding: Server not responding: loaded default config (please ensure the server is running)
compare.applyHasFailures: Finished with failures. Please check the results.

import.title: Import Execute
import.subtitle: Import an exported JSONL/JSON plan and execute it on the specified target. Useful for audited workflows or running on a different machine.
import.dragHint: Drag a file here, or click to select

errors.unrecognizedFormat: Unrecognized file format. Please provide a Plan JSON or JSONL (one step per line).

import.rewriteHint: When executing, the server uses the baseUrl/baseId you provided here and will attempt to rewrite imported URLs to the target.
import.importedSafeDefault: Imported: {{total}} steps (safe steps selected by default; {{danger}} dangerous steps require manual selection)
import.missingUrl: Step {{id}} is missing request.url and cannot be executed.
import.note: Note: headers in the imported file are usually *** (masked). During execution, the server injects the real token and resolves {tableId}/{columnId} placeholders in URLs.
